name: Khatabook
long_description: Replace your traditional ledgers with new digital Khatabook and Avail financial services like Lending for your business. Business owners can use the app to record credit (Jama) and debit (Udhar) transactions for their trusted customers. It is 100% Free, Safe, and Secure for all types of businesses to maintain their customers'​ accounts.
one_liner: Manage your ledgers and avail Financial Services like Lending on your…
